    • Method Detail

      • connectionDB

        public java.sql.Connection connectionDB()
        Makes the connection with the data base.
        Returns:
        Connection status.

      • logInDB

        public java.lang.String logInDB​(java.lang.String user_gmail,
                                java.lang.String password)
        Checks out in the database if the acces credentials are valid.
        Parameters:
        user_gmail - Player gmail account.
        password - Player password..
        Returns:
        A String with an error message if either user or password where wrong or "NO" if the acces credentials where correct.

      • dataBaseToArray

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> dataBaseToArray()
        Returns:
        An Arraylist of String with all the nicknames registered in the data base.

      • signInDB

        public void signInDB​(java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String lastName,
                     java.lang.String nickName,
                     java.lang.String password,
                     java.lang.String gmail)
        Signs in a new player.
        Parameters:
        name - Player name.
        lastName - Player lastname.
        nickName - Player nickname.
        password - Player password.
        gmail - Player gmail account.

      • nicknameOrGmailUsed

        public java.lang.String nicknameOrGmailUsed​(java.lang.String nickName,
                                            java.lang.String gmail)
        Checks out in the data base if either the nickname or email account chosen by the new player are already used.
        Parameters:
        nickName - Player nickname.
        gmail - Player gmail account.
        Returns:
        "NO" if neither nickname or email are already used.

        "user" if nickname is already used.

        "gmail" if nickname is already used.
